objects.name: Analytic 1513
objects.description: Office apps or scripts writing files followed by xattr manipulation (to evade quarantine) and subsequent HTTPS uploads. Defender perspective: anomalous file modification + outbound TLS traffic originating from non-networking apps (Word, Excel, Preview).

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execution of Office binaries with network activity

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: read/write of user documents prior to upload

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: outbound TLS connections to cloud storage providers

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Applications not expected to perform bulk data transfers (Office apps, Preview).
